member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.App.GetDevices
member.summary: Finds light devices in Tuya cloud and determines their IP-Addresses

member.summary: Gets the light device IP from background Thread

member.name: T:TuyaCoreController.Commands.GenerateColorPalletCommand
member.summary: Command to generate a pallet of colors Can always executed Generates a list of colors from 255, 0, 0 to 0,0,255

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.GenerateColorPalletCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method Generates a color pallet

member.name: T:TuyaCoreController.Commands.RetrieveLightsCommand
member.summary: Used in V0.1 - No more needed Replaced by PropertyChanged event and OnlineStatusEnum in class OwnTuyaDevice Retrieve online lights and refresh CloudLights Collection in the DataContext

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.RetrieveLightsCommand.CanExecute(System.Object)
member.returns: if the command is executeable or not

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.RetrieveLightsCommand.ChangeExecuteability(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Can not be executed when the online lights detection in already running

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.RetrieveLightsCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method Change the command executability and detect online lights and the bulb version

member.name: T:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SaveSelectedLightsCommand
member.summary: Save selected lights command Always executeable Clears the selected lights in Settings.xml, add the currently selected lights and override the Settings.xml

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SaveSelectedLightsCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method Gets the config from Configuration.Instance property, clear the SelectedLights collection, adds the currently selected lights and save the configuration w/o changing other properties

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SaveSettingsCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets the current config from Configuration.Instance property, change the config properties to the current values from the DataContext and saves the configuration including the selected lights

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SelectLightCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds the selected lights from the "cloud / local lights" list to the selected lights

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SelItemDeleteCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Removes the currently selected light from the selected lights collection in the DataContext

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SelItemDownwardsCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Move the currently selected item from the selected lights collection downwards (SelectedIdxSelLights + 1)

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.SelItemUpwardsCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Move the currently selected item from the selected lights collection upwards (SelectedIdxSelLights - 1)

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.StartLightShowCommand.ChangeExecuteable
member.summary: Reverse the executeability of the command and triggers the event handler

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.StartLightShowCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method Sets the AppState property in the DataContext, initialize all selected lights (turn them on) and sets them to colour-mode. Audio spectrum analyzer will be initialized and enabled

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.StopLightShowCommand.ChangeExecuteable
member.summary: Reverse the executeability of the command and triggers the event handler

member.name: M:TuyaCoreController.Commands.StopLightShowCommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Execute method Sets the AppState property in the DataContext. Disabling the Audio spectrum analyzer and sets all selected lights to white-mode
